CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaigns__c , "Reengage"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01536000002MCqP", "Reengage,",60,120), IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaigns__c , "Horizon"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01536000002MCqP", "Horizon,",60,120), IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaigns__c , "Warmup"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01536000002MCqP", "Warmup,",60,120), IF(ISPICKVAL(Campaigns__c, "Hand Raiser"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015360000025D8q", "Hand Raiser",60,120),null))))
CustomField.label: Campaign Indicator
